Third Act [i](If your life total is less than half of your starting life total or if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you enter the Third Act for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Choose two creatures you control. Last Kiss deals 3 damage to each other creature. If you're in your third act, after this phase, there is an additional combat phase. At the beginning of your next end step, sacrifice each creature you control.
